title: [Gameplay] Xin Zhao ignoring skill shots?
body: I'm sorry I'm not able to provide a lot of evidence on this, but I was playing as Xerath and Xin was able to pass right through my E. This was durring, and shortly after his dash had occurred. His items included: Fleasheater, Typhoon Claws, Dead Man's Plate, Trinity Force, Hexdrinker, and Mercury Treads. Though this only happened twice during the game, and there were plenty of times where I was able to stun him, I was really annoyed that this happened, and it lead to multiple deaths of not only myself but my team. I just wanted to bring this up in the forums to see if anyone else was having the same trouble.

replies.body: Xin's E sometimes allows him to go through skill shots. Had an Elise game on a different account a few days ago where he cheesed me by dashing through my stun. Thought it was some sort of bug but still kind of not quite sure. Tried recreating it in a custom game and was able to dash through some other skill shots.

> [{quoted}](name=Green Eyed,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=gvX9NIVN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-06T21:12:50.796+0000)
>
> Xin's E sometimes allows him to go through skill shots. Had an Elise game on a different account a few days ago where he cheesed me by dashing through my stun. Thought it was some sort of bug but still kind of not quite sure. Tried recreating it in a custom game and was able to dash through some other skill shots.

Was this on 5.15, or an Earlier patch?
It happened to me, so annoying.
